mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the correct use of the apostrophe in possessives: The cats toy are in the corner, The cat's toys are in the corner, The cats' toys are in the corner, The cats' toys; are in the corner

options.a: The cats toy are in the corner
options.b: The cat's toys are in the corner
options.c: The cats' toys are in the corner
options.d: The cats' toys; are in the corner
